contents:
There are no thugs, only tyranny, and the five major demands are indispensable


Here are the five demands not one less:


1. Release all demonstrators who participated in the protest against the death of Floyd.



2. Set up an independent investigation team to thoroughly investigate all cases of injustice caused by violent law enforcement by police in the United States.



3. Disband the United States Police Department.



4. Abolish the nomination system of political parties in the US general elections, and realize the true universal suffrage of the American people, with one person and one vote to elect the president.



5. Repeal all 20 US national security-related laws, accept the supervision of the UN investigation team, and return true human rights and freedoms to the American people.
